name: Bodega Catena Zapata
other_information: Number 1 vineyard in the world according to World's Best Vineyards.

name: Bodega Norton
other_information: Offer a wide range of wines, including Malbec, Cabernet Sauvignon, and more.

name: Bodega Trapiche
other_information: One of the largest wineries in Argentina, known for its diverse range of quality wines.

name: Bodega Luigi Bosca
other_information: Famous for its red wines, especially Malbec.

name: Bodega Achával-Ferrer
other_information: Renowned for its high-end red wines, such as Quimera and Finca Altamira.

name: Bodega Zuccardi
other_information: Known for its focus on sustainability and quality wines, such as their 'Zuccardi Q' series.

name: Bodega Terrazas de los Andes
other_information: Part of the Moët Hennessy group, specializing in high-altitude wines.

name: Bodega Alta Vista
other_information: Noted for its Malbec and other varietals.

name: Bodega Finca Decero
other_information: Known for its focus on terroir wines and its 'Remolinos Vineyard Malbec.'
